description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for Claude Code usage, performance, costs, and productivity

panels.description: Number of unique active Claude Code sessions
panels.title: Active Sessions

panels.description: Total estimated API costs in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Total Cost (24h)

panels.description: Percentage of tool executions that failed
panels.title: Tool Error Rate

panels.description: Ratio of Claude active time to user input time. Higher means Claude works more relative to your input.
panels.title: Productivity Ratio

panels.description: Cost breakdown by AI model over time
panels.title: Cost by Model

panels.description: Distribution of token usage by type
panels.title: Token Usage Breakdown

panels.description: Percentage of tokens served from cache vs fresh API calls
panels.title: Cache Efficiency

panels.description: Hourly cost burn rate trend
panels.title: Hourly Burn Rate

panels.description: Cost per 1000 lines of code added
panels.title: Cost per 1K Lines

panels.description: Distribution of tool usage across all sessions
panels.title: Tool Usage Distribution

panels.description: Success rate for each tool type

targets.expr: sum by (tool_name) (count_over_time({service_name="claude-code", tool_name=~"$tool"} | success="true" [$__range])) / sum by (tool_name) (count_over_time({service_name="claude-code", tool_name=~"$tool"} [$__range]))

panels.title: Tool Success Rate

panels.description: Heatmap showing tool execution duration patterns
panels.title: Tool Execution Duration

panels.description: Tool decision patterns showing allow/reject flows
panels.title: Tool Decision Patterns

panels.description: Success vs Failure distribution for subagent (Task) invocations
panels.title: Subagent Success Distribution

panels.description: Overall success rate for subagent (Task) invocations
panels.title: Subagent Success Rate

panels.description: Number of subagent invocations per session over time
panels.title: Subagents per Conversation

panels.description: Detailed view of subagent failures
panels.title: Subagent Error Analysis

panels.description: Maximum number of subagent calls in any single session
panels.title: Max Subagents/Session

panels.description: Timeline of errors over time
panels.title: Error Timeline

panels.description: Distribution of errors by tool type
panels.title: Errors by Tool

panels.description: Top 10 most common error messages
panels.title: Recent Errors

panels.description: Distribution of errors by tool type
panels.title: Errors by Tool

panels.description: Distribution of API retry attempts
panels.title: Errors Over Time

panels.description: Total number of failed tool executions
panels.title: Total Errors

panels.description: Lines of code added and removed over time
panels.title: Lines of Code

panels.description: Total number of commits created by Claude Code
panels.title: Commits Created

panels.description: Total number of pull requests created by Claude Code
panels.title: Pull Requests Created

panels.description: Equivalent human developer hours based on 75 lines/hour baseline
panels.title: Developer Equivalence

panels.title: Code Acceptance Rate

panels.title: Session Timeline

panels.title: Session Drill-down

panels.description: User prompt information (requires OTEL_LOG_USER_PROMPTS=1)
panels.title: Session Context Variables
